Description: Directs the processor to enter an implementation-dependent optimized state until the TSC reaches the value in EDX:EAX.
Sets up a linear address range to be monitored by hardware and activates the monitor. The address range should be a write-back memory caching type. The address is contained in r16/r32/r64.
A hint that allows the processor to stop instruction execution and enter an implementation-dependent optimized state until occurrence of a class of events.
